summary: I'M JUST ANOTHER OWNER OF A 2004 CHRYSLER PACIFICA (86,000MILES)WITH A RUSTED OUT SUB FRAME AND HAVE JUST BEEN GETTING THE SAME RUN-AROUND AND A BUNCH OF SORRY'S FROM THE COMPANY AND DEALERS, SOMEONE WILL HAVE TO GET HURT OR KILLED BEFORE SOMETHING IS DONE THAT'S THE WAY IT WORKS LAST CHRYSLER I'LL EVER BUY EVER OR ANYONE I CAN REACH OUT TO JUNK!!!!!!!!!!!! *TR
